dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: Key Vision Server Administration [mailto:support@keyvisionhosting.com]

Sent: Thursday, December 01, 2005 5:19 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; webmaster@taborama.com;
thomas.murphy@jassinlegal.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement

Several copyrighted works have been published on your server without
authorisation. In accordance with Title 17 or the United States Code (
http://www.copyright.gov/title17/92chap1.html ), please have them removed
immediately.

http://www.taboramaforum.com/index.php?showtopic=81458 (original may be
found at http://www.hotdrum.net/gt/gt-9-1.html )
http://www.taboramaforum.com/index.php?showtopic=81490 (original may be
found at http://www.hotdrum.net/gt/gt-1-1.html )
http://www.taboramaforum.com/index.php?showtopic=81395 (original may be
found at http://www.hotdrum.net/gt/gt-1-1.html )
http://www.taboramaforum.com/index.php?showtopic=81396 (original may be
found at http://www.hotdrum.net/gt/gt-7-1.html )
http://www.taboramaforum.com/index.php?showtopic=81431 (original may be
found at http://www.hotdrum.net/gt/gt-8-1.html )


--
Leigh MacDonald
Authorised Representative for Scott M. MacDonald, Don McCann, and Van N.
Tvedt Key Vision Web Services / HotDrum Network support@keyvisionhosting.com
952-393-6732
dmca.principal_name: Tvedt Key Vision Web Services (For Clients)
